pageDescription: We believe everyone holds the strength and wisdom for their own journey. SustainSage exists to provide a professional, non-judgemental space.

hero.title: Our Philosophy: Partnership in Potential
hero.subtitle: We believe everyone holds the strength and wisdom for their own journey. SustainSage exists to provide a professional, non-judgemental space for that potential to be seen and realised.

hc.name: Hao-Cheng Tsai
hc.title: Co-founder & Coach
hc.bio: Hao-Cheng is an ICF-certified coach focused on supporting individuals through career and life transitions. His approach is grounded in creating a safe, reflective space for clients to explore their goals.
hc.quote: My role isn't to provide answers, but to ask the questions that help you find your own.

yl.name: Yi-Ling Lai
yl.title: Co-founder & Science Advisory
yl.bio: With a background in behavioural science, Yi-Ling ensures our coaching framework is evidence-based and effective, integrating proven methodologies to support sustainable client growth.
yl.quote: We believe sustainable change is built on clear insights and consistent practice.
